languages: Abyssal, Aklo, Androffan, Common, Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Halfling, Hallit, Kellish, Orc, Osiriani, Polyglot, Skald, Tien, Varisian, Vudrani

sections.name: Special Abilities
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Sample AIs/Analyst AI/Special Abilities

sections.body: An analyst AI treats all Knowledge skills as class skills and can make all Knowledge skill checks untrained.
sections.name: Expert Knowledge
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Sample AIs/Analyst AI/Special Abilities/Expert Knowledge

sections.body: When an analyst AI takes 10 on an Intelligence- or Wisdom-based skill check, it rolls a d20 as well. If the die exceeds 10, it uses that instead.
sections.name: Multi-Core Processor
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Sample AIs/Analyst AI/Special Abilities/Multi-Core Processor

sections.body: An analyst AI uses its Intelligence modifier instead of its Dexterity modifier on Disable Device checks. Additionally, while in contact with an ally, it can use aid another on that ally's skill checks. This adds an additional round to the skill check, or multiple rounds for complicated questions. For every 5 points by which the AI's result exceeds 10, the bonus on the ally's check increases by 1.
sections.name: Remote Consult
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Sample AIs/Analyst AI/Special Abilities/Remote Consult

sections.body: Analyst AIs serve as expert systems to assist researchers. When not actively engaged in a project, they use their vast intellects and processing capabilities to ponder profound philosophical questions of existence.

feats: Alertness, Combat Expertise, Craft Technological Item, Improved Initiative, Improved Iron Will, Iron Will, TechnologistB
special_qualities: expert knowledge, multi-core processor, remote consult
name: Analyst AI
skills: Appraise +19, Craft (mechanical) +19, Diplomacy +13, Disable Device +19, Heal +13, Linguistics +23, Knowledge (engineering, geography, history, nature, religion) +23, Perception +15, Sense Motive +15
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Sample AIs/Analyst AI
